summary: Simple compatibility patch for Requiem and Animated Weapon Enchants
descriptionHtml:
This is a small patch for Requiem by Xarrian and Ogerboss and Animated Weapon Enchants by Vysh.
It is designed with Requiem 1.7.3 and AWE 1.14 in mind. Please check TES5Edit and see if a version update is necessary before contacting me about updates, thank you!
I might not be around the comments too often, if you have a question regarding versions please contact me via PM.

Enjoy!
author: Spock

files.name: Requiem - Animated Weapon Enchants patch
files.changelogHtml: Reuploaded the pack because of some embarrassing typos in the readme (there are probably more). Version number has not changed, it's still the same .esp
